name: REBound's Adventure
description:
This is REBound's Adventure, a platformer of a shadow thingy that can change his body dimensional perception and can throw a boomerang that it is actaully his soul.

You move with wasd and throw the boomerang with left click

Btw the main character name is Rico Ever Bound

PS: you can't play it online becuz i forgot to export the html5 version of the project and now I can't edit the game untill the jam is finished
